history.content:
Hey y'all! Are you interested in joining a tech organization and finding a community of some of the best people at Cal? If so, consider applying to Codebase! ( ͡❛ ͜ʖ ͡❛) <3

Codebase is a UC Berkeley student organization that empowers students to break into the software industry. We grow together through hands-on technical projects for high-growth tech companies, and strive to provide all students with resources to bridge the gap between academic and practical knowledge. We are a tight-knit community of developers, friends, and mentors who support and uplift each other throughout the college experience.

Each semester we have 4 client projects that work with companies and 1 mentored project that works with a nonprofit in Berkeley! If you're looking for a challenge or already have experience, consider joining our client teams! If not, don't worry! Mentored is perfect for you with a robust curriculum that covers the basics of web development and helps you build the soft skills needed to succeed in software engineering! Either way, we are looking for passionate engineers of all skill levels and backgrounds!

Come check out our Discord for more information!
------------------------------------

🔊 Discord: bit.ly/codebase-sp22-discord

📜 Interest Form: https://airtable.com/shryCP5mi5Ai547wQ

🌱 Link Tree: https://linktr.ee/berkeleycodebase

❗️ Apply now at https://codebase.berkeley.edu/

APPS DUE Thursday 1/27 @ 3 AM
history.subject: Join Berkeley Codebase! 🥰
